_gram:
(Supposed by some to
be a passive form of {#Df#})
_meanings: ; ({#Driyate, Dfta#})

{@--2@} To be 
maintained or preserved, remain, 
continue; {#surataSramasaMBfto muKe Driyate#} 
{#svedalavodgamo'pi te#} <ls>R. 8. 51</ls>; <ls>Ku. 4. 18.</ls>
{@--3@} To resolve upon.

{@--3@} To hold
in one's possession, possess, have, 

keep; {#yAM saMskftA DAryate#} <ls>Bh. 2. 19.</ls>

{@--5@} To
wear, put on, use (clothes, 
ornaments &c.); {#SritakamalAkucamaMqala#} 
{#DftakuMqala e#} <ls>Gīt. 1.</ls>

{@--6@} To hold in check,
curb, restrain, stop, detain.

{@--7@} To
fix upon, direct towards; (with
<ab>dat.</ab> or <ab>loc.</ab>); {#brAhmaRye DftamAnasaH, mano#}
{#daDre rAjasUyAya#} &c.

{@--8@} To suffer, 
undergo.

{@--9@} To assign anything to any
person, allot, assign.
{@--11@} To hold, contain.

{@--12@}
To observe, practise.

{@--13@} To cite,
quote.

{@--14@} To keep, retain (in
one's service).

{@--15@} To preserve,
maintain.
{@--16@} To seize, lay hold of.
{@--17@} To hold out or on, endure.

{@--18@}
To fix, place, deposit. (The senses of
this root may be variously modified
according to the noun with which it
is connected; {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} {#manasA Df#} to bear
in mind, remember; {#SirasA, --mUrDni Df#}
to bear on the head, respect highly;
{#aMtare Df#} to pledge, deposit anything
as surety; {#samaye Df#} to bring to
terms or agreement; {#daMqaM Df#} to
punish, chastise, use force; {#jIvitaM#},
{#--prARAn, --SarIraM, --gAtraM, --dehaM#} &c. {#Df#} to 
continue to live, maintain the soul &c.,
preserve the vital spirits; {#vrataM Df#} to
observe a vow; <ls>R. 2. 25</ls>; {#tulayA#}
{#Df#} to hold in a balance, weigh &c;
{#manaH --matiM, --cittaM, --budDiM Df#} to bend the
mind to a thing, fix the mind upon,
think of, resolve upon; {#garBaM Df#} to
become pregnant, conceive; {#DAraRAM#}
{#Df#} to practise concentration or
self-control &c.).
